text: That's my aunt, Wosie O'Donnell.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Oh. Oh, um. Pleasure to meet you, Miss O'Donnell. You're looking... well.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Don't worry kids. Everythng's gonna be fine. What's the problem?

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Aunt Wosie. We think I won for class president.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: No, Ike won.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Look, it's very simple. We took a vote and the vote tied, so now we gotta come up with a way-

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Well it obviously isn't that simple, is it?! I mean, you'd think a little kindergarten teacher could've handled this, but now we're gonna do it my way!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: South Park, outskirts. The Trapper Keeper enters the scene and demolishes the sign

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: We are Trapper Keeper.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Oh no! It is heading for Cheyenne Mountain!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Why is that bad?

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: It was when the Trapper Keeper assimilated with the supercomputer at Cheyenne Mountain that it was able to fuse into all defensive computors!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Then we have to stop it before it gets there!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Step on it, Bill Cosby!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: The road to Cheyenne Mountain. All is quiet. Two security guards wait at the entrance reading newspapers. The one wearing glasses looks up

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Hey Mark, look.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Wow. That is about the nicest Trapper Keeper I've ever seen.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Cartman, you have to stop!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: We are Trapper Keeper. We are one.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: A part of your friend must still be alive in there.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: He is in there.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: That must be what Trapper Keeper is using for ventilation. If one of you could get in there, you could reach the CPU

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: One-two-three not it!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Not- Aw, Damnit!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: The Trapper Keeper Interior. Kyle makes his way in and scrambles through a field of organs until he reaches another entrance. The valves open up and suck Kyle into a room bathed in light. Kyle floats in.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: What are you doing, Kyle?

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: I'm going to try and break you away from the computer, Cartman. I need to remove the CPU.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: I'm afraid I can't let you do that, Kyle.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Screw you, fatass!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Hey-eh, screw you.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Cartman!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Ahh!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: No!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Okay, so then what we're going to do is count everybody's vote by hand, and after that, we're gonna go over the votes again manually, and then-

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Oh, STOP IT, STOP STOP IHIHIHIHIT! Look kids, we're all in this kindergarten class together. We have to respect one another or else we're in for a terrible school year.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: We're just making sure that the kids that voted for my nephew don't get cheated.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Half the kids in the class didn't vote for your nephew, so what about them? You don't give a crap about them because they're not on your side! People like you preach tolerance and open-mindedness all the time, but when it comes to Middle America, you think we're all evil and stupid country yokels who need your political enlightenment!! WELL, JUST BECAUSE YOU'RE ON TV DOESN'T MEAN YOU KNOW CRAP ABOUT THE GOVERNMENT!!! NOW GET YOUR ASS BACK ON FIRST CLASS AND RESPECT THIS CLASS'S RIGHT TO MAKE UP THEIR OWN MINDS!!!  ...Oh, sorry I got a little off the subject, kids.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: How dare you?! I will not be preached at by a country bumpkin!  I'm leaving this podunk town, but in my place I'm gonna send more lawyers, statesmen and press than you have ever SEEN!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Oh no, children, I think I've just made this a whole lot worse.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: South Park, a red sunset. At Cheyenne Mountain the Trapper Keeper has spread itself over it and taken it over. A slimy appendage reaches out and grabs a phone both next to two ladies

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Aaahh!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Waaah!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Well that does it! I'm gonna have to report this!  Cargo on to base-  AAGH!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: It is infusing with everything. It is already too powerful to stop!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Kyle's got to succeed. He's just got to.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: The Trapper Keeper Interior. Kyle struggles to make his way out of the little prison he's in

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: I can't reach the CPU.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Cheyenne Mountain, outside. A limo speeds up to the scene and encounters the Trapper Keeper, which is beginning to look like the tower in "Bill"'s prophecy. Rosie O'Donnell pops out and walks up to it.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: What are you doin'?! Get out of my way!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Oh no! Now there's two of those things!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: No, I think that other thing is Rosie O'Donnell.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Huh? Which one? I- It's just like I'm seeing double.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: I said, get out of my way!  AAAaaAAaaaagh! Ogh. Noo-

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Eeww.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Look! I think that infusing with Rosie O'Donnell has made Trapper Keeper sick.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Oohh. Bad pie. Bad pie.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: This is your chance, Kyle! Cartman has weakened!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: The Trapper Keeper Interior. Cartman releases his hold on Kyle and Kyle drops to the floor. He quickly moves to the wall panel containing the CPU and pulls the CPU out along with some memory chips

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Got 'em!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Cheyenne Mountain, outside. Trapper Keeper turns into a big mass of goo, and the people trapped in it are spat out. Rosie ends up half-eaten. Everybody begins to approach the survivors

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: He did it!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: South Park Elementary, kindergarten. The kids are seated around the round table, and their lawyers stand behind them arguing. Mr. Garrison sits at the head of the table listening

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Okay, children, the lawyers for Ike's side have agreed with the lawyers on Filmore's side to hold another meeting regardng Form 22F. Do we all have that form?

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Is this the Kindergarten classroom?

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Jesse Jackson?

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: That's right! I believe the African-American in your class were misrepresented!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: We don't have any African-Americans in our class!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Oh. Bye.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Alright, so apparently what we're gonna do now is hand-count each person's ballot-

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Mistoreh Garrison, I concede.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: You... yuh, you what?

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: I don't wanna play anymore, 'cause this game is stupid!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Yeah. It doesn't make any sense.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Ike, you could be class president.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: I pooped my pants!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Can we fingerpaint now?

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Fingerpaint! Fingerpaint!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Ohuh. Yes.  Yes! Let's fingerpaint!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Cheyenne Mountain, aftermath. Stan and the others reach Cartman and Kyle

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: You did it, Kyle!  Kyle saved your life, fatass!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Goodbye, humons.  Oh, ogh! Oh, it hurts!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Oh, that's a bitch.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Ogh. Well, I guess everything's fine now. So let's go home.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Hey! Whoa whoa whoa, Cartman! All you've been doing is making fun of Kyle and now he's saved your life! You at least owe him a thank you!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Awww man.

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Cartman!

title: TRAPPER KEEPER
text: Alright, alright.  Kyle, -
